content: to 1 stitch before the bor working the final stitch before bor as set the gusset set up is complete n1 = 32 36 40 n2 = 51 57 63 working the gusset round 1 n1 work next chart a1/a2 row n2 right sock ktbl knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 sm k to last stitch ktbl p p left sock - ktbl p p knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 sm k to last stitch ktbl © mary pat mcgurk 2023 v 1 5 5 round 2 n1 work next chart a1/a2 row n2 right sock - ktbl knit to marker sm k1 ssk k to last stitch ktbl p p left sock - ktbl p p knit to marker sm k1 ssk k to last stitch ktbl work rounds 1 and 2 until stitches on n2 are decreased to 32 36 40 on completing a row 36 of chart a1/a2 continue with the same chart beginning with a row 1 remove the center of the heel marker during final decrease round then work the round 3 instructions before continuing on to the foot round 3 n1 work next chart a1/a2 row n2 right sock ktbl knit to last stitch ktbl p p left sock - ktbl p p knit to last stitch ktbl foot continue working as set in round 3 above through completion of chart a1/a2 s row 36 work as set once again chart a1/a2 through completion of row 17 for a shorter foot version end with a row 13 planning for foot length and start of toe as written the charted toe decreasing rounds add up to an additional 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ in 4 5 5 6 cm there s a plan to add rounds included in the d1/d2 toe charts if additional foot length is needed before beginning the toe decreasing rounds toe toe set-up round round 1 on the instep work chart d1/d2 row 1 on the sole knit all stitches foot lengthening round optional repeat as needed for extra foot length the foot lengthening rounds are found in the charts d1/d2 on the row 2 of both sock s toes round 2 on the instep work chart d1/d2 row 2 on the sole knit transition round before starting the toe decreases round 3 on the instep work chart d1/d2 row 3 on the sole knit all stitches toe decrease rounds note toe decreases occur along edges of the instep there are no decreases on the sole round 4 on the instep work next row as charted on the sole k to last stitch move last stitch to instep round 5 on the instep work next row as charted to the last stitch move the first stitch from the sole to the instep work the last 2 stitches as charted on the sole k all stitches © mary pat mcgurk 2023 v 1 5 6 continue to work remaining charted rounds as set in rounds 4 and
